obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_49_: \EN* Noelle!? What are you doing with Kris!?/
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_114: \E5* I know what you really want to say./%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_132: \EG* It's why you're not with Queen right now./%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_163: \E6* Kris is FORCING you to be on THEIR side!!/
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_164: \E2* Kidnapper!^1! Kris^1, our truce..^1. is OVER!!!/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_179: \E6* Noelle!^1! This may hurt^1, but it's to help you!!/
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_235: \E4* Just in time^1! We can both go back to Queen and--/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_251: \Ee* Kris^1, it looks like another enemy./
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_255: \EN* Noelle^1, it's me^1, don't you recognize me!?/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_272: \EN* What..^1. what are you doing with Kris?/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_286: \EN* Noelle^1, what are they talking about!?/
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_304: \E9* Th-that's it^1, Kris^1! I don't know what you're doing.../
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_305: \EA* But if you're hurting my friend Noelle.../%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_318: \EB* Then I have no choice but to stop you by force!/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_353: \E2* (Th..^1. that's right^1, what was I thinking just now?)/
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_354: \E6* (That's right..^1. Kris is my friend^1, right?)/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_363: \E7* Did you leave your IQ points at home!?/
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_364: \E6* Noelle is only going to be protected BY ME!/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_380: \E7* And I'll FIGHT HER to PROVE IT!/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_537: \E3* Kris^1, maybe we should have gone easier on him.../%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_551: \ED* The only one going easy mode^1, was me!/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_573: \ED* I'm only tired of HOLDING BACK MY TRUE POWER!/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_583: \EE* Ah^1, Noelle. It'd be too simple to save you now./
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_584: \E7* Kris^1! Go ahead and train your strength values./
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_585: \E1* Try hard^1, and maybe someday you'll be a worthy rival./%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_592: \EE* Heh^1! Sometimes I can't believe how cool I am.../%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_612: \EH* (He hit me in the face with a tornado...)/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_619: \E4* (If he would just listen to me...)/%
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_646: \ES* You were just trying to make Berdly mad^1, weren't you!?/
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_647: \EQ* Come on^1, that's not nice^1, Kris./
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_648: \ER* ..^1. Though^1, it's not like I don't understand the feeling./
obj_ch2_city_berdly_slash_Step_0_gml_650: \E8* I guess we both kind of got carried away...!/
